definition: flower arrangement consisting of a circular band of foliage or flowers for ornamental purposes, adorn with bands of flowers or leaves
details:
noun
- flower arrangement consisting of a circular band of foliage or flowers for ornamental purposes
= synonyms: wreath
- an anthology of short literary pieces and poems and ballads etc.
= synonyms: florilegium, miscellany
verb
- adorn with bands of flowers or leaves
= example: adorn with bands of flowers or leaves
